sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the Accountability for the
Investment of Public Funds Act.

sections.heading: Online information concerning investment of public funds.
sections.text:
Each
State agency shall make available on the Internet, and
update at
least monthly by the 15th of the month, sufficient information concerning the
investment of any public
funds held
by that State agency to identify the following:

sections.heading: Information exempt from posting requirement.
sections.text:
Nothing in this
Act shall require a State agency to make information available on the Internet
that is exempt from inspection and copying under the Freedom of Information
Act.
